column5: Located in Upper Burton Creek, in an upscale neighborhood on the edge of the Eastside Historic District. Just 2 miles from Historic Downtown Bryan. A 5 bedroom home, with a sequestered master bedroom suite (550 sq ft) with a spa-like bathroom. Includes a second master bedroom with private entrance to the pool/hot tub and private bathroom.
column8: Cozy 5 Bedroom Historic Area Home near Kyle Field
